name: Social Services
description: Below is a list of social services that they provide year-round: 1. CalFresh (food stamp) application sign up 2. Referrals to any of our 50/66 campus partners (see Partners page) or other outside providers 3. Translation for letters, phone calls, applications, and more 4. Workshops addressing safety, health, emergency, voter information, and more
